'''Skin Pack 5''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 45 skins referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games. It is exclusive to the {{editions|xb360|xbone}} of ''[[Minecraft]]''.

|-
|Punk 3
|[[File:Skin Pack 5 Punk 3 skin render.png|60px]]
|Combined with a red and black look, this skin wears fishnet gloves and long red hair which is paired with a dark headband.
|This skin is only included in the ''Xbox One Edition'' version of this pack.
|-
|Punk 4
|[[File:Skin Pack 5 Punk 4 skin render.png|60px]]
|A skin wearing a short, red-plaid skirt, a black crop top and green eyes, completing the look with cubic spikes.
|This skin is only included in the ''Xbox One Edition'' version of this pack.
|-
|Punk 5
|[[File:Skin Pack 5 Punk 5 skin render.png|60px]]
|The green mohawk exceeds tradition geometry standards, becoming the centerpiece of the skin as this skin wears a black vest and ripped trousers.
|This skin is only included in the ''Xbox One Edition'' version of this pack.
